metadata.title: CVE-2018-17479 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect object lifetime calculations in GPU code in Google Chrome priorto 70.0.3538.110 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
